channel.title: Need a brilliant coder
channel.description:
[b]Hi.
I need a very good coder that knows alot and that will actually help me with anything. I need help with the following things:
~~Adding/Removing NPC's~~ ~~Adding/Removing Spawned Items (Example Banks)~~ ~~Adding/Removing Shop Items~~ ~~Adding Shop Prices~~ ~~Adding SAFE/WILD Areas~~ ~~Adding/Removing Teleport Tabs~~ ~~Changing Areas~~ ~~Changing Combat/Skill Levels~~ ~~Removing Nulls On Client~~ If you wish to help me and be a Co Owner of my Hamachi server E-Mail or Chat to me on: My MSN [i]ix_jaz_xi@hotmail.co.uk[/i][/b]

item.title: Need a brilliant coder
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

Adding/Removing NPC’s
Adding/Removing Spawned Items (Example Banks)
Adding/Removing Shop Items
Adding Shop Prices
Adding SAFE/WILD Areas
Changing Areas how changing?
~~Changing Combat/Skill Levels~ also what do you mean?

i can HELP with those

Read full topic

item.title: Need a brilliant coder
item.dc:creator: @m3l33_demon m3l33 demon
item.description:
@m3l33_demon wrote:

[quote=“iX_Jaz_Xi, post:1, topic:280059”]Adding/Removing NPC’s
Adding/Removing Spawned Items (Example Banks)
Adding/Removing Shop Items
Adding Shop Prices
Adding SAFE/WILD Areas
Changing Areas
Changing Combat/Skill Levels
Removing Nulls On Client[/quote]
If you define THOSE ^ coding skills as brilliant, you need some help. Those can be learned yourself in about 1 day. It’s not hard. Plus you broke the rules, so good luck.

Read full topic
